message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor since I'm making the first move. This is a fair offer considering you get a substantial portion without any negotiation effort.

Alice, as we both know the total value decreases by 5% each round, accepting this offer now will save both our gains. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor, ensuring you still receive a substantial amount. Let's lock this deal before further losses accumulate.
